info.name: Rent A Girlfriend API
info.description:
This is a girlfriend rental service API

Contact Support:
 Name: API Support
 Email: support@swagger.io

request.description: Authenticates a user and returns a JWT token
Registers a new user with username, email, password and role
Cancels a booking if it belongs to the authenticated user. Only the boy who made the booking can cancel it.

item.name: get all booking of a user

request.description: get all booking of a user

item.name: Get a specific girl's profile by ID

request.description: Retrieves detailed information about a girl's profile using their ID

item.name: Get available girls with optional filtering

request.description: Retrieves a list of available girls. Can be filtered by date and age. If no filters are provided, returns all available girls.

item.name: Submit a rating and review for a girl

request.description: Allows users to submit ratings (1-5 stars) and written reviews for girls they have booked
